admin/messages.step1.instruction2: 2. After exporting: open your email and download the attached file
admin/messages.step1.instruction3: 3. Open the exported file on Excel or Numbers
admin/messages.step1.instruction4: 4. Translate the following columns in the speadsheet:
admin/messages.step1.instruction5: 5. After translating:  save the file and click Next to continue
